Info.Title: The Family
Info.Writer: Luc Besson (screenplay), Michael Caleo (screenplay), Tonino Benacquista (based on the book by)
Info.Actors: Robert De Niro, Michelle Pfeiffer, Dianna Agron, John D'Leo
Info.Plot: The Manzoni family, a notorious mafia clan, is relocated to Normandy, France under the Witness Protection Program, where fitting in soon becomes challenging, as their old habits die hard.
